attributes.action: ensure that the post office in Ditherington, Shrewsbury, is not closed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ditherington Post Office, Shrewsbury, is a very busy and, we believe, profitable unit which provides vital services to many in the community.  We believe that data used by P O Ltd may be flawed. Furthermore, the alternative will not be able to cope with increased business, has poor accessibility and little car parking.
